rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Grand entry with reception area following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room adjoining the courtyard. Natural light from south-facing windows as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area with a view of the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed in Chettinad style, incorporating ventilation and ample storage. Placed towards the North as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom with attached bathroom. North-West facing to ensure privacy and positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Additional room for visitors positioned in a calm location near the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom connected to the Master Bedroom. Designed with tiled interiors and adequate drainage.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large entrance door on the south-west side with a canopy for shelter. Vastu-aligned to invite positive energy.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.description: Double door opening on the north side leading to the two-car garage. Ensures smooth vehicle access and adherence to safety norms.

openings.name: Courtyard Opening
openings.description: Opening from the central courtyard to living spaces for natural ventilation and light.

openings.name: Library Window
openings.description: Window dedicated to the library area providing quiet space with views towards the garden courtyard.

courtyard.description: Central open-air courtyard designed to promote natural ventilation and light. Features traditional Chettinad landscaping with water elements as per Vastu for balance.

garage.description: Two-car garage integrated into the design at the northern edge of the plot. Ensures easy access and conforms to local building norms.

library.description: Chettinad style library space with a quiet ambiance, natural lighting and Vastu-compliant orientation to support concentration.
